mapper.select: select SIGNUP_DATA, TO_CHAR(SIGNUP_DATE, 'YYYY-MM') as recentdate, count(*) as cnt from signup where signup_id not in ('admin') and SIGNUP_DATE between (select to_char(add_months(sysdate,-2),'yyyy-mm-dd') from dual) AND sysdate GROUP BY TO_CHAR(SIGNUP_DATE, 'YYYY-MM'), SIGNUP_DATA order by TO_CHAR(SIGNUP_DATE, 'YYYY-MM'), SIGNUP_DATA

select TO_CHAR(board_date, 'YYYY-MM-dd') as curdate, count(*) as cnt from board where board_date between (select to_char(sysdate-7,'yyyy-mm-dd') from dual) AND sysdate GROUP BY TO_CHAR(board_date, 'YYYY-MM-dd') order by TO_CHAR(board_date, 'YYYY-MM-dd')

select TO_CHAR(reply_date, 'YYYY-MM-dd') as curdate, count(*) as cnt from reply where reply_date between (select to_char(sysdate-7,'yyyy-mm-dd') from dual) AND sysdate GROUP BY TO_CHAR(reply_date, 'YYYY-MM-dd') order by TO_CHAR(reply_date, 'YYYY-MM-dd')

select s.cntsignup, both.cntboth, b.cntboard, r.cntreply from (select count(*) as cntsignup from signup) s, (select count(*) as cntboth from (select r2.reply_signup_id from reply r2 join board b2 on r2.reply_signup_id = b2.board_writer_id group by b2.board_writer_id, r2.reply_signup_id)) both, (select count(*) as cntboard from (select board_writer_id from board where board_writer_id in (select signup_id from signup) group by board_writer_id)) b, (select count(*) as cntreply from (select reply_signup_id from reply where reply_signup_id in (select signup_id from signup) group by reply_signup_id)) r
